title: Tales of the Peculiar - Ransom Riggs [EN EPUB] [ebook] [p_s]
description:
Tales of the Peculiar by Ransom Riggs (Miss Peregrine)
English | 2016 | YA Fantasy | 13.2 MB


Before Miss Peregrine gave them a home, the story of peculiars was written in the Tales.
Wealthy cannibals who dine on the discarded limbs of peculiars. A fork-tongued princess. These are but a few of the truly brilliant stories in Tales of the Peculiarâ€”the collection of fairy tales known to hide information about the peculiar world, including clues to the locations of time loopsâ€”first introduced by Ransom Riggs in his #1 bestselling Miss Peregrineâ€™s Peculiar Children series.
Riggs now invites you to share his secrets of peculiar history, with a collection of original stories in this deluxe volume of Tales of the Peculiar, as collected and annotated by Millard Nullings, ward of Miss Peregrine and scholar of all things peculiar. Featuring stunning illustrations from world-renowned artist Andrew Davidson, this compelling, rich, and truly peculiar anthology is the perfect gift for not only fans, but for all lovers of great storytelling.

Enjoy and please SEED!!!
